SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.jidesoft.swing
Class JideCursors

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.swing.JideCursors

public class JideCursors
extends Object

A utility class that create additional cursors used by JIDE products.

Notes: this class has to be public so that JIDE can use it in different packages, not meant to release to end user as a public API. JIDE will not gurantee the class will remain as it is.
